mn135:2.1: Atha kho subho manavo todeyyaputto yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
mn135:2.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho subho manavo todeyyaputto bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn135:3.1: “Ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu ko paccayo yena manussanamyeva satam manussabhutanam dissanti hinappanitata?
mn135:3.2: Dissanti hi, bho gotama, manussa appayuka, dissanti dighayuka;
mn135:3.9: Ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu ko paccayo yena manussanamyeva satam manussabhutanam dissanti hinappanitata”ti?
mn135:4.1: “Kammassaka, manava, satta kammadayada kammayoni kammabandhu kammappatisarana.
mn135:4.4: “Na kho aham imassa bhoto gotamassa sankhittena bhasitassa vittharena attham avibhattassa vittharena attham ajanami.
mn135:4.5: Sadhu me bhavam gotamo tatha dhammam desetu yatha aham imassa bhoto gotamassa sankhittena bhasitassa vittharena attham avibhattassa vittharena attham ajaneyyan”ti.
mn135:4.6: “Tena hi, manava, sunahi, sadhukam manasi karohi; bhasissami”ti.
mn135:4.7: “Evam, bho”ti kho subho manavo todeyyaputto bhagavato paccassosi.

mn135:19.1: Iti kho, manava, appayukasamvattanika patipada appayukattam upaneti, dighayukasamvattanika patipada dighayukattam upaneti;
mn135:19.2: bavhabadhasamvattanika patipada bavhabadhattam upaneti, appabadhasamvattanika patipada appabadhattam upaneti;
mn135:19.3: dubbannasamvattanika patipada dubbannattam upaneti, pasadikasamvattanika patipada pasadikattam upaneti;
mn135:19.4: appesakkhasamvattanika patipada appesakkhattam upaneti, mahesakkhasamvattanika patipada mahesakkhattam upaneti;
mn135:19.5: appabhogasamvattanika patipada appabhogattam upaneti, mahabhogasamvattanika patipada mahabhogattam upaneti;
mn135:19.6: nicakulinasamvattanika patipada nicakulinattam upaneti, uccakulinasamvattanika patipada uccakulinattam upaneti;
mn135:19.7: duppannasamvattanika patipada duppannattam upaneti, mahapannasamvattanika patipada mahapannattam upaneti.
mn135:20.1: Kammassaka, manava, satta kammadayada kammayoni kammabandhu kammappatisarana.
mn135:21.1: Evam vutte, subho manavo todeyyaputto bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn135:21.3: Seyyathapi, bho gotama, nikkujjitam va ukkujjeyya, paticchannam va vivareyya, mulhassa va maggam acikkheyya, andhakare va telapajjotam dhareyya: ‘cakkhumanto rupani dakkhanti’ti; evamevam bhota gotamena anekapariyayena dhammo pakasito.
mn135:21.4: Esaham bhavantam gotamam saranam gacchami dhammanca bhikkhusanghanca.
mn135:21.5: Upasakam mam bhavam gotamo dharetu ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatan”ti.
